2941 +
2942 +    /**
2943 +     * Event handler for an app shortcut click.
2944 +     *
2945 +     * @param v The view that was clicked. Must be a tagged with a {@link ShortcutInfo}.
2946 +     */
2947 +    protected void onClickAppShortcut(final View v) {
2948 +        if (LOGD) Log.d(TAG, "onClickAppShortcut");
2949 +        Object tag = v.getTag();
2950 +        if (!(tag instanceof ShortcutInfo)) {
2951 +            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input must be a Shortcut");
2952 +        }
2953 +
2954 +        // Open shortcut
2955 +        final ShortcutInfo shortcut = (ShortcutInfo) tag;
2956 +        final Intent intent = shortcut.intent;
2957 +
2958 +        // Check for special shortcuts
2959 +        if (intent.getComponent() != null) {
2960 +            final String shortcutClass = intent.getComponent().getClassName();
2961 +
2962 +            if (shortcutClass.equals(MemoryDumpActivity.class.getName())) {
2963 +                MemoryDumpActivity.startDump(this);
2964 +                return;
2965 +            } else if (shortcutClass.equals(ToggleWeightWatcher.class.getName())) {
2966 +                toggleShowWeightWatcher();
2967 +                return;
2968 +            }
2969 +        }
2970 +
2971 +        // Check for abandoned promise
2972 +        if ((v instanceof BubbleTextView)
2973 +                && shortcut.isPromise()
2974 +                && !shortcut.hasStatusFlag(ShortcutInfo.FLAG_INSTALL_SESSION_ACTIVE)) {
2975 +            showBrokenAppInstallDialog(
2976 +                    shortcut.getTargetComponent().getPackageName(),
2977 +                    new DialogInterface.OnClickListener() {
2978 +                        public void onClick(DialogInterface dialog, int id) {
2979 +                            startAppShortcutOrInfoActivity(v);
2980 +                        }
2981 +                    });
2982 +            return;
2983 +        }
2984 +
2985 +        // Start activities
2986 +        startAppShortcutOrInfoActivity(v);
2987 +    }
2988 +
2989 +    private void startAppShortcutOrInfoActivity(View v) {
2990 +        Object tag = v.getTag();
2991 +        final ShortcutInfo shortcut;
2992 +        final Intent intent;
2993 +        if (tag instanceof ShortcutInfo) {
2994 +            shortcut = (ShortcutInfo) tag;
2995 +            intent = shortcut.intent;
2996 +            int[] pos = new int[2];
2997 +            v.getLocationOnScreen(pos);
2998 +            intent.setSourceBounds(new Rect(pos[0], pos[1],
2999 +                    pos[0] + v.getWidth(), pos[1] + v.getHeight()));
3000 +
3001 +        } else if (tag instanceof AppInfo) {
3002 +            shortcut = null;
3003 +            intent = ((AppInfo) tag).intent;
3004          } else {
3005 -            String packageName = componentName.getPackageName();
3006 -            String className = componentName.getClassName();
3007 -            Intent intent = new Intent(
3008 -                    Intent.ACTION_DELETE, Uri.fromParts("package", packageName, className));
3009 -            intent.setFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK |
3010 -                    Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_EXCLUDE_FROM_RECENTS);
3011 -            startActivity(intent);
3012 -            return true;
3013 -        }
3014 -    }
3015 -
3016 -    boolean startActivity(View v, Intent intent, Object tag) {
3017 -        intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
3018 -
3019 -        try {
3020 -            // Only launch using the new animation if the shortcut has not opted out (this is a
3021 -            // private contract between launcher and may be ignored in the future).
3022 -            boolean useLaunchAnimation = (v != null) &&
3023 -                    !intent.hasExtra(INTENT_EXTRA_IGNORE_LAUNCH_ANIMATION);
3024 -            if (useLaunchAnimation) {
3025 -                ActivityOptions opts = ActivityOptions.makeScaleUpAnimation(v, 0, 0,
3026 -                        v.getMeasuredWidth(), v.getMeasuredHeight());
3027 -
3028 -                startActivity(intent, opts.toBundle());
3029 -            } else {
3030 -                startActivity(intent);
3031 -            }
3032 -            return true;
3033 -        } catch (SecurityException e) {
3034 -            Toast.makeText(this, R.string.activity_not_found, Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
3035 -            Log.e(TAG, "Launcher does not have the permission to launch " + intent +
3036 -                    ". Make sure to create a MAIN intent-filter for the corresponding activity " +
3037 -                    "or use the exported attribute for this activity. "
3038 -                    + "tag="+ tag + " intent=" + intent, e);
3039 -        }
3040 -        return false;
3041 -    }
3042 -
3043 -    boolean startActivitySafely(View v, Intent intent, Object tag) {
3044 -        boolean success = false;
3045 -        try {
3046 -            success = startActivity(v, intent, tag);
3047 -        } catch (ActivityNotFoundException e) {
3048 -            Toast.makeText(this, R.string.activity_not_found, Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
3049 -            Log.e(TAG, "Unable to launch. tag=" + tag + " intent=" + intent, e);
3050 -        }
3051 -        return success;
3052 -    }
3053 -
3054 -    private void handleFolderClick(FolderIcon folderIcon) {
3055 +            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input must be a Shortcut or AppInfo");
3056 +        }
3057 +
3058 +        boolean success = startActivitySafely(v, intent, tag);
3059 +        mStats.recordLaunch(intent, shortcut);
3060 +
3061 +        if (success && v instanceof BubbleTextView) {
3062 +            mWaitingForResume = (BubbleTextView) v;
3063 +            mWaitingForResume.setStayPressed(true);
3064 +        }
3065 +    }
3066 +
3067 +    /**
3068 +     * Event handler for a folder icon click.
3069 +     *
3070 +     * @param v The view that was clicked. Must be an instance of {@link FolderIcon}.
3071 +     */
3072 +    protected void onClickFolderIcon(View v) {
3073 +        if (LOGD) Log.d(TAG, "onClickFolder");
3074 +        if (!(v instanceof FolderIcon)){
3075 +            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input must be a FolderIcon");
3076 +        }
3077 +
3078 +        FolderIcon folderIcon = (FolderIcon) v;
3079          final FolderInfo info = folderIcon.getFolderInfo();
3080          Folder openFolder = mWorkspace.getFolderForTag(info);
3081  
3082          // If the folder info reports that the associated folder is open, then verify that
3083          // it is actually opened. There have been a few instances where this gets out of sync.
3084          if (info.opened && openFolder == null) {
3085              Log.d(TAG, "Folder info marked as open, but associated folder is not open. Screen: "
3086                      + info.screenId + " (" + info.cellX + ", " + info.cellY + ")");
3087              info.opened = false;
3088          }
3089  
3090          if (!info.opened && !folderIcon.getFolder().isDestroyed()) {
3091              // Close any open folder
3092              closeFolder();
3093              // Open the requested folder
3094              openFolder(folderIcon);
3095          } else {
3096              // Find the open folder...
3097              int folderScreen;
3098              if (openFolder != null) {
3099                  folderScreen = mWorkspace.getPageForView(openFolder);
3100                  // .. and close it
3101                  closeFolder(openFolder);
3102                  if (folderScreen != mWorkspace.getCurrentPage()) {
3103                      // Close any folder open on the current screen
3104                      closeFolder();
3105                      // Pull the folder onto this screen
3106                      openFolder(folderIcon);
3107                  }
3108              }
3109          }
3110      }
3111

3113 +     * Event handler for the (Add) Widgets button that appears after a long press
3114 +     * on the home screen.

3140 +    public void onTouchDownAllAppsButton(View v) {
3141 +        // Provide the same haptic feedback that the system offers for virtual keys.

3144 +
3145 +    public void performHapticFeedbackOnTouchDown(View v) {
3146 +        // Provide the same haptic feedback that the system offers for virtual keys.
3147 +        v.performHapticFeedback(HapticFeedbackConstants.VIRTUAL_KEY);
3148 +    }
3149 +
3150 +    public View.OnTouchListener getHapticFeedbackTouchListener() {
3151 +        if (mHapticFeedbackTouchListener == null) {
3152 +            mHapticFeedbackTouchListener = new View.OnTouchListener() {
3153 +                @Override
3154 +                public boolean onTouch(View v, MotionEvent event) {
3155 +                    if ((event.getAction() & MotionEvent.ACTION_MASK) == MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN) {
3156 +                        v.performHapticFeedback(HapticFeedbackConstants.VIRTUAL_KEY);
3157 +                    }
3158 +                    return false;
3159 +                }
3160 +            };
3161 +        }
3162 +        return mHapticFeedbackTouchListener;
3163 +    }

3167 +    /**
3168 +     * Called when the user stops interacting with the launcher.
3169 +     * This implies that the user is now on the homescreen and is not doing housekeeping.
3170 +     */
3171 +    protected void onInteractionEnd() {}
3172 +
3173 +    /**
3174 +     * Called when the user starts interacting with the launcher.
3175 +     * The possible interactions are:
3176 +     *  - open all apps
3177 +     *  - reorder an app shortcut, or a widget
3178 +     *  - open the overview mode.
3179 +     * This is a good time to stop doing things that only make sense
3180 +     * when the user is on the homescreen and not doing housekeeping.
3181 +     */
3182 +    protected void onInteractionBegin() {}
3183 +
3184 +    void startApplicationDetailsActivity(ComponentName componentName, UserHandleCompat user) {
3185 +        String packageName = componentName.getPackageName();
3186 +        try {
3187 +            LauncherAppsCompat launcherApps = LauncherAppsCompat.getInstance(this);
3188 +            UserManagerCompat userManager = UserManagerCompat.getInstance(this);
3189 +            launcherApps.showAppDetailsForProfile(componentName, user);
3190 +        } catch (SecurityException e) {
3191 +            Toast.makeText(this, R.string.activity_not_found, Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
3192 +            Log.e(TAG, "Launcher does not have permission to launch settings");
3193 +        } catch (ActivityNotFoundException e) {
3194 +            Toast.makeText(this, R.string.activity_not_found, Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
3195 +            Log.e(TAG, "Unable to launch settings");
3196 +        }
3197 +    }
3198 +
3199 +    // returns true if the activity was started
3200 +    boolean startApplicationUninstallActivity(ComponentName componentName, int flags,
3201 +            UserHandleCompat user) {
3202 +        if ((flags & AppInfo.DOWNLOADED_FLAG) == 0) {
3203 +            // System applications cannot be installed. For now, show a toast explaining that.
3204 +            // We may give them the option of disabling apps this way.
3205 +            int messageId = R.string.uninstall_system_app_text;
3206 +            Toast.makeText(this, messageId, Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
3207 +            return false;
3208 +        } else {
3209 +            String packageName = componentName.getPackageName();
3210 +            String className = componentName.getClassName();
3211 +            Intent intent = new Intent(
3212 +                    Intent.ACTION_DELETE, Uri.fromParts("package", packageName, className));
3213 +            intent.setFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK |
3214 +                    Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_EXCLUDE_FROM_RECENTS);
3215 +            if (user != null) {
3216 +                user.addToIntent(intent, Intent.EXTRA_USER);
3217 +            }
3218 +            startActivity(intent);
3219 +            return true;
3220 +        }
3221 +    }
3222 +
3223 +    boolean startActivity(View v, Intent intent, Object tag) {
3224 +        intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
3225 +        try {
3226 +            // Only launch using the new animation if the shortcut has not opted out (this is a
3227 +            // private contract between launcher and may be ignored in the future).
3228 +            boolean useLaunchAnimation = (v != null) &&
3229 +                    !intent.hasExtra(INTENT_EXTRA_IGNORE_LAUNCH_ANIMATION);
3230 +            LauncherAppsCompat launcherApps = LauncherAppsCompat.getInstance(this);
3231 +            UserManagerCompat userManager = UserManagerCompat.getInstance(this);
3232 +
3233 +            UserHandleCompat user = null;
3234 +            if (intent.hasExtra(AppInfo.EXTRA_PROFILE)) {
3235 +                long serialNumber = intent.getLongExtra(AppInfo.EXTRA_PROFILE, -1);
3236 +                user = userManager.getUserForSerialNumber(serialNumber);
3237 +            }
3238 +
3239 +            Bundle optsBundle = null;
3240 +            if (useLaunchAnimation) {
3241 +                ActivityOptions opts = Utilities.isLmpOrAbove() ?
3242 +                        ActivityOptions.makeCustomAnimation(this, R.anim.task_open_enter, R.anim.no_anim) :
3243 +                        ActivityOptions.makeScaleUpAnimation(v, 0, 0, v.getMeasuredWidth(), v.getMeasuredHeight())ðŸ”µ
3244 +                optsBundle = opts.toBundle();
3245 +            }
3246 +
3247 +            if (user == null || user.equals(UserHandleCompat.myUserHandle())) {
3248 +                // Could be launching some bookkeeping activity
3249 +                startActivity(intent, optsBundle);
3250 +            } else {
3251 +                // TODO Component can be null when shortcuts are supported for secondary user
3252 +                launcherApps.startActivityForProfile(intent.getComponent(), user,
3253 +                        intent.getSourceBounds(), optsBundle);
3254 +            }
3255 +            return true;
3256 +        } catch (SecurityException e) {
3257 +            Toast.makeText(this, R.string.activity_not_found, Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
3258 +            Log.e(TAG, "Launcher does not have the permission to launch " + intent +
3259 +                    ". Make sure to create a MAIN intent-filter for the corresponding activity " +
3260 +                    "or use the exported attribute for this activity. "
3261 +                    + "tag="+ tag + " intent=" + intent, e);
3262 +        }
3263 +        return false;
3264 +    }
3265 +
3266 +    boolean startActivitySafely(View v, Intent intent, Object tag) {
3267 +        boolean success = false;
3268 +        if (mIsSafeModeEnabled && !Utilities.isSystemApp(this, intent)) {
3269 +            Toast.makeText(this, R.string.safemode_shortcut_error, Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
3270 +            return false;
3271 +        }
3272 +        try {
3273 +            success = startActivity(v, intent, tag);
3274 +        } catch (ActivityNotFoundException e) {
3275 +            Toast.makeText(this, R.string.activity_not_found, Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
3276 +            Log.e(TAG, "Unable to launch. tag=" + tag + " intent=" + intent, e);
3277 +        }
3278 +        return success;
3279 +    }
3280 +
3281 +    /**
3282       * This method draws the FolderIcon to an ImageView and then adds and positions that ImageView
3283       * in the DragLayer in the exact absolute location of the original FolderIcon.
3284       */
3285      private void copyFolderIconToImage(FolderIcon fi) {
3286          final int width = fi.getMeasuredWidth();
3287          final int height = fi.getMeasuredHeight();
3288  
3289          // Lazy load ImageView, Bitmap and Canvas
3290          if (mFolderIconImageView == null) {
3291              mFolderIconImageView = new ImageView(this);
3292          }
3293          if (mFolderIconBitmap == null || mFolderIconBitmap.getWidth() != width ||
3294                  mFolderIconBitmap.getHeight() != height) {
3295              mFolderIconBitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(width, height, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);
3296              mFolderIconCanvas = new Canvas(mFolderIconBitmap);
3297          }
3298  
3299          DragLayer.LayoutParams lp;
3300          if (mFolderIconImageView.getLayoutParams() instanceof DragLayer.LayoutParams) {
3301              lp = (DragLayer.LayoutParams) mFolderIconImageView.getLayoutParams();
3302          } else {
3303              lp = new DragLayer.LayoutParams(width, height);
3304          }
3305  
3306          // The layout from which the folder is being opened may be scaled, adjust the starting
3307          // view size by this scale factor.
3308          float scale = mDragLayer.getDescendantRectRelativeToSelf(fi, mRectForFolderAnimation);
3309          lp.customPosition = true;
3310          lp.x = mRectForFolderAnimation.left;
3311          lp.y = mRectForFolderAnimation.top;
3312          lp.width = (int) (scale * width);
3313          lp.height = (int) (scale * height);
3314  
3315          mFolderIconCanvas.drawColor(0, PorterDuff.Mode.CLEAR);
3316          fi.draw(mFolderIconCanvas);
3317          mFolderIconImageView.setImageBitmap(mFolderIconBitmap);
3318          if (fi.getFolder() != null) {
3319              mFolderIconImageView.setPivotX(fi.getFolder().getPivotXForIconAnimation());
3320              mFolderIconImageView.setPivotY(fi.getFolder().getPivotYForIconAnimation());
3321          }
3322          // Just in case this image view is still in the drag layer from a previous animation,
3323          // we remove it and re-add it.
3324          if (mDragLayer.indexOfChild(mFolderIconImageView) != -1) {
3325              mDragLayer.removeView(mFolderIconImageView);
3326          }
3327          mDragLayer.addView(mFolderIconImageView, lp);
3328          if (fi.getFolder() != null) {
3329              fi.getFolder().bringToFront();
3330          }
3331      }
3332  
3333      private void growAndFadeOutFolderIcon(FolderIcon fi) {
3334          if (fi == null) return;
3335          PropertyValuesHolder alpha = PropertyValuesHolder.ofFloat("alpha", 0);
3336          PropertyValuesHolder scaleX = PropertyValuesHolder.ofFloat("scaleX", 1.5f);
3337          PropertyValuesHolder scaleY = PropertyValuesHolder.ofFloat("scaleY", 1.5f);
3338  
3339          FolderInfo info = (FolderInfo) fi.getTag();
3340          if (info.container == LauncherSettings.Favorites.CONTAINER_HOTSEAT) {
3341              CellLayout cl = (CellLayout) fi.getParent().getParent();
3342              CellLayout.LayoutParams lp = (CellLayout.LayoutParams) fi.getLayoutParams();
3343              cl.setFolderLeaveBehindCell(lp.cellX, lp.cellY);
3344          }
3345  
3346          // Push an ImageView copy of the FolderIcon into the DragLayer and hide the original
3347          copyFolderIconToImage(fi);
3348          fi.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
3349  
3350          ObjectAnimator oa = LauncherAnimUtils.ofPropertyValuesHolder(mFolderIconImageView, alpha,
3351                  scaleX, scaleY);
3352 -        oa.setDuration(getResources().getInteger(R.integer.config_folderAnimDuration));
3353 +        if (Utilities.isLmpOrAbove()) {
3354 +            oa.setInterpolator(new LogDecelerateInterpolator(100, 0));
3355 +        }
3356 +        oa.setDuration(getResources().getInteger(R.integer.config_folderExpandDuration));
3357          oa.start();
3358      }
3359  
3360      private void shrinkAndFadeInFolderIcon(final FolderIcon fi) {
3361          if (fi == null) return;
3362          PropertyValuesHolder alpha = PropertyValuesHolder.ofFloat("alpha", 1.0f);
3363          PropertyValuesHolder scaleX = PropertyValuesHolder.ofFloat("scaleX", 1.0f);
3364          PropertyValuesHolder scaleY = PropertyValuesHolder.ofFloat("scaleY", 1.0f);
3365  
3366          final CellLayout cl = (CellLayout) fi.getParent().getParent();
3367  
3368          // We remove and re-draw the FolderIcon in-case it has changed
3369          mDragLayer.removeView(mFolderIconImageView);
3370          copyFolderIconToImage(fi);
3371          ObjectAnimator oa = LauncherAnimUtils.ofPropertyValuesHolder(mFolderIconImageView, alpha,
3372                  scaleX, scaleY);
3373 -        oa.setDuration(getResources().getInteger(R.integer.config_folderAnimDuration));
3374 +        oa.setDuration(getResources().getInteger(R.integer.config_folderExpandDuration));
3375          oa.addListener(new AnimatorListenerAdapter() {
3376              @Override
3377              public void onAnimationEnd(Animator animation) {
3378                  if (cl != null) {
3379                      cl.clearFolderLeaveBehind();
3380                      // Remove the ImageView copy of the FolderIcon and make the original visible.
3381                      mDragLayer.removeView(mFolderIconImageView);
3382                      fi.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
3383                  }
3384              }
3385          });
3386          oa.start();
3387      }
3388  
3389      /**
3390       * Opens the user folder described by the specified tag. The opening of the folder
3391       * is animated relative to the specified View. If the View is null, no animation
3392       * is played.
3393       *
3394       * @param folderInfo The FolderInfo describing the folder to open.
3395       */
3396      public void openFolder(FolderIcon folderIcon) {
3397          Folder folder = folderIcon.getFolder();
3398          FolderInfo info = folder.mInfo;
3399  
3400          info.opened = true;
3401  
3402          // Just verify that the folder hasn't already been added to the DragLayer.
3403          // There was a one-off crash where the folder had a parent already.
3404          if (folder.getParent() == null) {
3405              mDragLayer.addView(folder);
3406              mDragController.addDropTarget((DropTarget) folder);
3407          } else {
3408              Log.w(TAG, "Opening folder (" + folder + ") which already has a parent (" +
3409                      folder.getParent() + ").");
3410          }
3411          folder.animateOpen();
3412          growAndFadeOutFolderIcon(folderIcon);
3413  
3414          // Notify the accessibility manager that this folder "window" has appeared and occluded
3415          // the workspace items
3416          folder.sendAccessibilityEvent(AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED);
3417          getDragLayer().sendAccessibilityEvent(AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_WINDOW_CONTENT_CHANGED);
3418      }
3419  
3420      public void closeFolder() {
3421          Folder folder = mWorkspace != null ? mWorkspace.getOpenFolder() : null;
3422          if (folder != null) {
3423              if (folder.isEditingName()) {
3424                  folder.dismissEditingName();
3425              }
3426              closeFolder(folder);
3427 -
3428 -            // Dismiss the folder cling
3429 -            dismissFolderCling(null);

3430          }
3431      }
3432  
3433      void closeFolder(Folder folder) {
3434          folder.getInfo().opened = false;
3435  
3436          ViewGroup parent = (ViewGroup) folder.getParent().getParent();
3437          if (parent != null) {
3438              FolderIcon fi = (FolderIcon) mWorkspace.getViewForTag(folder.mInfo);
3439              shrinkAndFadeInFolderIcon(fi);
3440          }
3441          folder.animateClosed();
3442  
3443          // Notify the accessibility manager that this folder "window" has disappeard and no
3444          // longer occludeds the workspace items
3445          getDragLayer().sendAccessibilityEvent(AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED);
3446      }
3447  
3448      public boolean onLongClick(View v) {
3449          if (!isDraggingEnabled()) return false;
3450          if (isWorkspaceLocked()) return false;
3451          if (mState != State.WORKSPACE) return false;
3452  
3453          if (v instanceof Workspace) {
3454              if (!mWorkspace.isInOverviewMode()) {
3455                  if (mWorkspace.enterOverviewMode()) {
3456                      mWorkspace.performHapticFeedback(HapticFeedbackConstants.LONG_PRESS,
3457                              HapticFeedbackConstants.FLAG_IGNORE_VIEW_SETTING);
3458                      return true;
3459                  } else {
3460                      return false;
3461                  }
3462 -            }
3463 -        }
3464 -
3465 -        if (!(v instanceof CellLayout)) {
3466 -            v = (View) v.getParent().getParent();
3467 -        }
3468 -
3469 -        resetAddInfo();
3470 -        CellLayout.CellInfo longClickCellInfo = (CellLayout.CellInfo) v.getTag();
3471 -        // This happens when long clicking an item with the dpad/trackball
3472 -        if (longClickCellInfo == null) {
3473 -            return true;
3474 +            } else {
3475 +                return false;
3476 +            }
3477 +        }
3478 +
3479 +        CellLayout.CellInfo longClickCellInfo = null;
3480 +        View itemUnderLongClick = null;
3481 +        if (v.getTag() instanceof ItemInfo) {
3482 +            ItemInfo info = (ItemInfo) v.getTag();
3483 +            longClickCellInfo = new CellLayout.CellInfo(v, info);;
3484 +            itemUnderLongClick = longClickCellInfo.cell;
3485 +            resetAddInfo();
3486          }
3487  
3488          // The hotseat touch handling does not go through Workspace, and we always allow long press
3489          // on hotseat items.
3490 -        final View itemUnderLongClick = longClickCellInfo.cell;
3491 -        boolean allowLongPress = isHotseatLayout(v) || mWorkspace.allowLongPress();
3492 +        final boolean inHotseat = isHotseatLayout(v);
3493 +        boolean allowLongPress = inHotseat || mWorkspace.allowLongPress();
3494          if (allowLongPress && !mDragController.isDragging()) {
3495              if (itemUnderLongClick == null) {
3496                  // User long pressed on empty space
3497                  mWorkspace.performHapticFeedback(HapticFeedbackConstants.LONG_PRESS,
3498                          HapticFeedbackConstants.FLAG_IGNORE_VIEW_SETTING);
3499 -                // Disabling reordering until we sort out some issues.
3500                  if (mWorkspace.isInOverviewMode()) {
3501                      mWorkspace.startReordering(v);
3502                  } else {
3503                      mWorkspace.enterOverviewMode();
3504                  }
3505              } else {
3506 -                if (!(itemUnderLongClick instanceof Folder)) {
3507 +                final boolean isAllAppsButton = inHotseat && isAllAppsButtonRank(
3508 +                        mHotseat.getOrderInHotseat(
3509 +                                longClickCellInfo.cellX,
3510 +                                longClickCellInfo.cellY));
3511 +                if (!(itemUnderLongClick instanceof Folder || isAllAppsButton)) {
3512                      // User long pressed on an item
3513                      mWorkspace.startDrag(longClickCellInfo);
3514                  }
3515              }
3516          }
3517          return true;
3518      }
3519  
3520      boolean isHotseatLayout(View layout) {
3521          return mHotseat != null && layout != null &&
3522                  (layout instanceof CellLayout) && (layout == mHotseat.getLayout());
3523 -    }

3534      /**
3535       * Returns the CellLayout of the specified container at the specified screen.
3536       */
3537      CellLayout getCellLayout(long container, long screenId) {
3538          if (container == LauncherSettings.Favorites.CONTAINER_HOTSEAT) {
3539              if (mHotseat != null) {
3540                  return mHotseat.getLayout();
3541              } else {
3542                  return null;
3543              }
3544          } else {
3545              return (CellLayout) mWorkspace.getScreenWithId(screenId);
3546          }
3547      }

3588  
3589      private void dispatchOnLauncherTransitionStart(View v, boolean animated, boolean toWorkspace) {
3590          if (v instanceof LauncherTransitionable) {
3591              ((LauncherTransitionable) v).onLauncherTransitionStart(this, animated, toWorkspace);
3592          }
3593  
3594          // Update the workspace transition step as well
3595          dispatchOnLauncherTransitionStep(v, 0f);
3596      }
3597  
3598      private void dispatchOnLauncherTransitionStep(View v, float t) {
3599          if (v instanceof LauncherTransitionable) {
3600              ((LauncherTransitionable) v).onLauncherTransitionStep(this, t);
3601          }
3602      }
3603  
3604      private void dispatchOnLauncherTransitionEnd(View v, boolean animated, boolean toWorkspace) {
3605          if (v instanceof LauncherTransitionable) {
3606              ((LauncherTransitionable) v).onLauncherTransitionEnd(this, animated, toWorkspace);
3607          }
3608  
3609          // Update the workspace transition step as well
3610          dispatchOnLauncherTransitionStep(v, 1f);
3611      }

3613      /**
3614       * Things to test when changing the following seven functions.
3615       *   - Home from workspace
3616       *          - from center screen
3617       *          - from other screens
3618       *   - Home from all apps
3619       *          - from center screen
3620       *          - from other screens
3621       *   - Back from all apps
3622       *          - from center screen
3623       *          - from other screens
3624       *   - Launch app from workspace and quit
3625       *          - with back
3626       *          - with home
3627       *   - Launch app from all apps and quit
3628       *          - with back
3629       *          - with home
3630       *   - Go to a screen that's not the default, then all
3631       *     apps, and launch and app, and go back
3632       *          - with back
3633       *          -with home
3634       *   - On workspace, long press power and go back
3635       *          - with back
3636       *          - with home
3637       *   - On all apps, long press power and go back
3638       *          - with back
3639       *          - with home
3640       *   - On workspace, power off
3641       *   - On all apps, power off
3642       *   - Launch an app and turn off the screen while in that app
3643       *          - Go back with home key
3644       *          - Go back with back key  TODO: make this not go to workspace
3645       *          - From all apps
3646       *          - From workspace
3647       *   - Enter and exit car mode (becuase it causes an extra configuration changed)
3648       *          - From all apps
3649       *          - From the center workspace
3650       *          - From another workspace
3651       */
3652

3743 +            }
3744 +
3745 +            // Hide the real page background, and swap in the fake one
3746 +            content.setPageBackgroundsVisible(false);
3747 +            revealView.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
3748 +            // We need to hide this view as the animation start will be posted.
3749 +            revealView.setAlpha(0);
3750 +
3751 +            int width = revealView.getMeasuredWidth();
3752 +            int height = revealView.getMeasuredHeight();
3753 +            float revealRadius = (float) Math.sqrt((width * width) / 4 + (height * height) / 4);
3754 +
3755 +            revealView.setTranslationY(0);
3756 +            revealView.setTranslationX(0);
3757 +
3758 +            // Get the y delta between the center of the page and the center of the all apps button
3759 +            int[] allAppsToPanelDelta = Utilities.getCenterDeltaInScreenSpace(revealView,
3760 +                    getAllAppsButton(), null);
3761 +
3762 +            float alpha = 0;
3763 +            float xDrift = 0;
3764 +            float yDrift = 0;
3765 +            if (material) {
3766 +                alpha = isWidgetTray ? 0.3f : 1f;
3767 +                yDrift = isWidgetTray ? height / 2 : allAppsToPanelDelta[1];
3768 +                xDrift = isWidgetTray ? 0 : allAppsToPanelDelta[0];
3769 +            } else {
3770 +                yDrift = 2 * height / 3;
3771 +                xDrift = 0;
3772 +            }
3773 +            final float initAlpha = alpha;
3774 +
3775 +            revealView.setLayerType(View.LAYER_TYPE_HARDWARE, null);
3776 +            layerViews.add(revealView);
3777 +            PropertyValuesHolder panelAlpha = PropertyValuesHolder.ofFloat("alpha", initAlpha, 1f);
3778 +            PropertyValuesHolder panelDriftY =
3779 +                    PropertyValuesHolder.ofFloat("translationY", yDrift, 0);
3780 +            PropertyValuesHolder panelDriftX =
3781 +                    PropertyValuesHolder.ofFloat("translationX", xDrift, 0);
3782 +
3783 +            ObjectAnimator panelAlphaAndDrift = ObjectAnimator.ofPropertyValuesHolder(revealView,
3784 +                    panelAlpha, panelDriftY, panelDriftX);
3785 +
3786 +            panelAlphaAndDrift.setDuration(revealDuration);
3787 +            panelAlphaAndDrift.setInterpolator(new LogDecelerateInterpolator(100, 0));
3788 +
3789 +            mStateAnimation.play(panelAlphaAndDrift);
3790 +
3791 +            if (page != null) {
3792 +                page.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
3793 +                page.setLayerType(View.LAYER_TYPE_HARDWARE, null);
3794 +                layerViews.add(page);
3795 +
3796 +                ObjectAnimator pageDrift = ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(page, "translationY", yDrift, 0);
3797 +                page.setTranslationY(yDrift);
3798 +                pageDrift.setDuration(revealDuration);
3799 +                pageDrift.setInterpolator(new LogDecelerateInterpolator(100, 0));
3800 +                pageDrift.setStartDelay(itemsAlphaStagger);
3801 +                mStateAnimation.play(pageDrift);
3802 +
3803 +                page.setAlpha(0f);
3804 +                ObjectAnimator itemsAlpha = ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(page, "alpha", 0f, 1f);
3805 +                itemsAlpha.setDuration(revealDuration);
3806 +                itemsAlpha.setInterpolator(new AccelerateInterpolator(1.5f));
3807 +                itemsAlpha.setStartDelay(itemsAlphaStagger);
3808 +                mStateAnimation.play(itemsAlpha);
3809 +            }
3810 +
3811 +            View pageIndicators = toView.findViewById(R.id.apps_customize_page_indicator);
3812 +            pageIndicators.setAlpha(0.01f);
3813 +            ObjectAnimator indicatorsAlpha =
3814 +                    ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(pageIndicators, "alpha", 1f);
3815 +            indicatorsAlpha.setDuration(revealDuration);
3816 +            mStateAnimation.play(indicatorsAlpha);
3817 +
3818 +            if (material) {
3819 +                final View allApps = getAllAppsButton();
3820 +                int allAppsButtonSize = LauncherAppState.getInstance().
3821 +                        getDynamicGrid().getDeviceProfile().allAppsButtonVisualSize;
3822 +                float startRadius = isWidgetTray ? 0 : allAppsButtonSize / 2;

3824 +                                height / 2, startRadius, revealRadius);
3825 +                reveal.setDuration(revealDuration);
3826 +                reveal.setInterpolator(new LogDecelerateInterpolator(100, 0));
3827 +

3829 +                    public void onAnimationStart(Animator animation) {
3830 +                        if (!isWidgetTray) {
3831 +                            allApps.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
3832 +                        }
3833                      }

3836 -                    dispatchOnLauncherTransitionStep(toView, t);
3837 -                }
3838 -            });
3839 -

3841 -            // animation

3847 +                            allApps.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
3848 +                        }

3850 +                });

3966       * Zoom the camera back into the workspace, hiding 'fromView'.
3967       * This is the opposite of showAppsCustomizeHelper.
3968       * @param animated If true, the transition will be animated.
3969       */

4103 +
4104 +                // The vertical motion of the apps panel should be delayed by one frame
4105 +                // from the conceal animation in order to give the right feel. We correpsondingly
4106 +                // shorten the duration so that the slide and conceal end at the same time.

4175 +                        public void onAnimationEnd(Animator animation) {
4176 +                            revealView.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
4177 +                            if (!isWidgetTray) {
4178 +                                allAppsButton.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
4179 +                            }
4180 +                        }
4181 +                    });
4182 +
4183 +                    mStateAnimation.play(reveal);
4184 +                }
4185 +
4186 +                dispatchOnLauncherTransitionPrepare(fromView, animated, true);
4187 +                dispatchOnLauncherTransitionPrepare(toView, animated, true);

4191              mStateAnimation.addListener(new AnimatorListenerAdapter() {
4192                  @Override
4193                  public void onAnimationEnd(Animator animation) {
4194                      fromView.setVisibility(View.GONE);
4195                      dispatchOnLauncherTransitionEnd(fromView, animated, true);

4197                      if (onCompleteRunnable != null) {
4198                          onCompleteRunnable.run();

4236 +                    // we waited for a layout/draw pass

4268  
4269      @Override
4270      public void onTrimMemory(int level) {
4271          super.onTrimMemory(level);
4272          if (level >= ComponentCallbacks2.TRIM_MEMORY_MODERATE) {
4273              mAppsCustomizeTabHost.onTrimMemory();
4274          }
4275      }
4276  
4277      protected void showWorkspace(boolean animated) {
4278          showWorkspace(animated, null);
4279      }
4280  
4281      protected void showWorkspace() {
4282          showWorkspace(true);
4283      }
4284  
4285      void showWorkspace(boolean animated, Runnable onCompleteRunnable) {
4286 -        if (mWorkspace.isInOverviewMode()) {
4287 -            mWorkspace.exitOverviewMode(animated);
4288 -        }
4289 -        if (mState != State.WORKSPACE) {
4290 +        if (mState != State.WORKSPACE || mWorkspace.getState() != Workspace.State.NORMAL) {
4291              boolean wasInSpringLoadedMode = (mState != State.WORKSPACE);
4292              mWorkspace.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
4293              hideAppsCustomizeHelper(Workspace.State.NORMAL, animated, false, onCompleteRunnable);
4294  
4295              // Show the search bar (only animate if we were showing the drop target bar in spring
4296              // loaded mode)
4297              if (mSearchDropTargetBar != null) {
4298                  mSearchDropTargetBar.showSearchBar(animated && wasInSpringLoadedMode);
4299              }
4300  
4301              // Set focus to the AppsCustomize button
4302              if (mAllAppsButton != null) {
4303                  mAllAppsButton.requestFocus();
4304              }
4305          }
4306  
4307          // Change the state *after* we've called all the transition code
4308          mState = State.WORKSPACE;
4309  
4310          // Resume the auto-advance of widgets
4311          mUserPresent = true;
4312          updateRunning();
4313  
4314          // Send an accessibility event to announce the context change
4315          getWindow().getDecorView()
4316                  .sendAccessibilityEvent(AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED);
4317  
4318          onWorkspaceShown(animated);
4319      }

4321      void showOverviewMode(boolean animated) {
4322          mWorkspace.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
4323          hideAppsCustomizeHelper(Workspace.State.OVERVIEW, animated, false, null);
4324          mState = State.WORKSPACE;
4325          onWorkspaceShown(animated);
4326      }

4331      void showAllApps(boolean animated, AppsCustomizePagedView.ContentType contentType,
4332                       boolean resetPageToZero) {
4333          if (mState != State.WORKSPACE) return;
4334  
4335          if (resetPageToZero) {
4336              mAppsCustomizeTabHost.reset();
4337          }
4338          showAppsCustomizeHelper(animated, false, contentType);

4341 +            @Override
4342 +            public void run() {
4343 +                // We post this in-case the all apps view isn't yet constructed.
4344 +                mAppsCustomizeTabHost.requestFocus();
4345 +            }
4346 +        });

4348          // Change the state *after* we've called all the transition code
4349          mState = State.APPS_CUSTOMIZE;
4350  
4351          // Pause the auto-advance of widgets until we are out of AllApps
4352          mUserPresent = false;
4353          updateRunning();
4354          closeFolder();
4355  
4356          // Send an accessibility event to announce the context change
4357          getWindow().getDecorView()
4358                  .sendAccessibilityEvent(AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED);
4359      }
4360  
4361      void enterSpringLoadedDragMode() {
4362          if (isAllAppsVisible()) {
4363              hideAppsCustomizeHelper(Workspace.State.SPRING_LOADED, true, true, null);
4364              mState = State.APPS_CUSTOMIZE_SPRING_LOADED;
4365          }
4366      }
4367  
4368      void exitSpringLoadedDragModeDelayed(final boolean successfulDrop, int delay,
4369              final Runnable onCompleteRunnable) {
4370          if (mState != State.APPS_CUSTOMIZE_SPRING_LOADED) return;
4371  
4372          mHandler.postDelayed(new Runnable() {
4373              @Override
4374              public void run() {
4375                  if (successfulDrop) {
4376                      // Before we show workspace, hide all apps again because
4377                      // exitSpringLoadedDragMode made it visible. This is a bit hacky; we should
4378                      // clean up our state transition functions
4379                      mAppsCustomizeTabHost.setVisibility(View.GONE);
4380                      showWorkspace(true, onCompleteRunnable);
4381                  } else {
4382                      exitSpringLoadedDragMode();
4383                  }
4384              }
4385          }, delay);
4386 -
4387      }
4388  
4389      void exitSpringLoadedDragMode() {
4390          if (mState == State.APPS_CUSTOMIZE_SPRING_LOADED) {
4391              final boolean animated = true;
4392              final boolean springLoaded = true;
4393              showAppsCustomizeHelper(animated, springLoaded);
4394              mState = State.APPS_CUSTOMIZE;
4395          }
4396          // Otherwise, we are not in spring loaded mode, so don't do anything.
4397      }

4425  
4426      /**
4427       * Hides the hotseat area.
4428       */
4429      void hideHotseat(boolean animated) {
4430          if (!LauncherAppState.getInstance().isScreenLarge()) {
4431              if (animated) {
4432                  if (mHotseat.getAlpha() != 0f) {
4433                      int duration = 0;
4434                      if (mSearchDropTargetBar != null) {
4435                          duration = mSearchDropTargetBar.getTransitionOutDuration();
4436                      }
4437                      mHotseat.animate().alpha(0f).setDuration(duration);
4438                  }
4439              } else {
4440                  mHotseat.setAlpha(0f);
4441              }
4442          }
4443      }

4445      /**
4446       * Add an item from all apps or customize onto the given workspace screen.
4447       * If layout is null, add to the current screen.
4448       */
4449      void addExternalItemToScreen(ItemInfo itemInfo, final CellLayout layout) {
4450          if (!mWorkspace.addExternalItemToScreen(itemInfo, layout)) {
4451              showOutOfSpaceMessage(isHotseatLayout(layout));
4452          }
4453      }
4454  
4455      /** Maps the current orientation to an index for referencing orientation correct global icons */
4456      private int getCurrentOrientationIndexForGlobalIcons() {
4457          // default - 0, landscape - 1
4458          switch (getResources().getConfiguration().orientation) {
4459          case Configuration.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE:
4460              return 1;
4461          default:
4462              return 0;
4463          }
4464      }
4465  
4466      private Drawable getExternalPackageToolbarIcon(ComponentName activityName, String resourceName) {
4467          try {
4468              PackageManager packageManager = getPackageManager();
4469              // Look for the toolbar icon specified in the activity meta-data
4470              Bundle metaData = packageManager.getActivityInfo(
4471                      activityName, PackageManager.GET_META_DATA).metaData;
4472              if (metaData != null) {
4473                  int iconResId = metaData.getInt(resourceName);
4474                  if (iconResId != 0) {
4475                      Resources res = packageManager.getResourcesForActivity(activityName);
4476                      return res.getDrawable(iconResId);
4477                  }
4478              }
4479          } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
4480              // This can happen if the activity defines an invalid drawable
4481              Log.w(TAG, "Failed to load toolbar icon; " + activityName.flattenToShortString() +
4482                      " not found", e);
4483          } catch (Resources.NotFoundException nfe) {
4484              // This can happen if the activity defines an invalid drawable
4485              Log.w(TAG, "Failed to load toolbar icon from " + activityName.flattenToShortString(),
4486                      nfe);
4487          }
4488          return null;
4489      }
4490  
4491      // if successful in getting icon, return it; otherwise, set button to use default drawable
4492      private Drawable.ConstantState updateTextButtonWithIconFromExternalActivity(
4493              int buttonId, ComponentName activityName, int fallbackDrawableId,
4494              String toolbarResourceName) {
4495          Drawable toolbarIcon = getExternalPackageToolbarIcon(activityName, toolbarResourceName);
4496          Resources r = getResources();
4497          int w = r.getDimensionPixelSize(R.dimen.toolbar_external_icon_width);
4498          int h = r.getDimensionPixelSize(R.dimen.toolbar_external_icon_height);
4499  
4500          TextView button = (TextView) findViewById(buttonId);
4501          // If we were unable to find the icon via the meta-data, use a generic one
4502          if (toolbarIcon == null) {
4503              toolbarIcon = r.getDrawable(fallbackDrawableId);
4504              toolbarIcon.setBounds(0, 0, w, h);
4505              if (button != null) {
4506                  button.setCompoundDrawables(toolbarIcon, null, null, null);
4507              }
4508              return null;
4509          } else {
4510              toolbarIcon.setBounds(0, 0, w, h);
4511              if (button != null) {
4512                  button.setCompoundDrawables(toolbarIcon, null, null, null);
4513              }
4514              return toolbarIcon.getConstantState();
4515          }
4516      }
4517  
4518      // if successful in getting icon, return it; otherwise, set button to use default drawable
4519      private Drawable.ConstantState updateButtonWithIconFromExternalActivity(
4520              int buttonId, ComponentName activityName, int fallbackDrawableId,
4521              String toolbarResourceName) {
4522          ImageView button = (ImageView) findViewById(buttonId);
4523          Drawable toolbarIcon = getExternalPackageToolbarIcon(activityName, toolbarResourceName);
4524  
4525          if (button != null) {
4526              // If we were unable to find the icon via the meta-data, use a
4527              // generic one
4528              if (toolbarIcon == null) {
4529                  button.setImageResource(fallbackDrawableId);
4530              } else {
4531                  button.setImageDrawable(toolbarIcon);
4532              }
4533          }
4534  
4535          return toolbarIcon != null ? toolbarIcon.getConstantState() : null;
4536  
4537      }
4538  
4539      private void updateTextButtonWithDrawable(int buttonId, Drawable d) {
4540          TextView button = (TextView) findViewById(buttonId);
4541          button.setCompoundDrawables(d, null, null, null);
4542      }
4543  
4544      private void updateButtonWithDrawable(int buttonId, Drawable.ConstantState d) {
4545          ImageView button = (ImageView) findViewById(buttonId);
4546          button.setImageDrawable(d.newDrawable(getResources()));
4547      }
4548  
4549      private void invalidatePressedFocusedStates(View container, View button) {
4550          if (container instanceof HolographicLinearLayout) {
4551              HolographicLinearLayout layout = (HolographicLinearLayout) container;
4552              layout.invalidatePressedFocusedStates();
4553          } else if (button instanceof HolographicImageView) {
4554              HolographicImageView view = (HolographicImageView) button;
4555              view.invalidatePressedFocusedStates();
4556          }
4557      }

4560 -        if (mQsbBar == null) {
4561 -            mQsbBar = mInflater.inflate(R.layout.search_bar, mSearchDropTargetBar, false);
4562 -            mSearchDropTargetBar.addView(mQsbBar);
4563 -        }
4564 -        return mQsbBar;
4565 +        if (mQsb == null) {
4566 +            mQsb = mInflater.inflate(R.layout.qsb, mSearchDropTargetBar, false);
4567 +            mSearchDropTargetBar.addView(mQsb);
4568 +        }
4569 +        return mQsb;
4570      }
4571  
4572      protected boolean updateGlobalSearchIcon() {
4573          final View searchButtonContainer = findViewById(R.id.search_button_container);
4574          final ImageView searchButton = (ImageView) findViewById(R.id.search_button);
4575          final View voiceButtonContainer = findViewById(R.id.voice_button_container);
4576          final View voiceButton = findViewById(R.id.voice_button);
4577  
4578          final SearchManager searchManager =
4579                  (SearchManager) getSystemService(Context.SEARCH_SERVICE);
4580          ComponentName activityName = searchManager.getGlobalSearchActivity();
4581          if (activityName != null) {
4582              int coi = getCurrentOrientationIndexForGlobalIcons();
4583              sGlobalSearchIcon[coi] = updateButtonWithIconFromExternalActivity(
4584                      R.id.search_button, activityName, R.drawable.ic_home_search_normal_holo,
4585                      TOOLBAR_SEARCH_ICON_METADATA_NAME);
4586              if (sGlobalSearchIcon[coi] == null) {
4587                  sGlobalSearchIcon[coi] = updateButtonWithIconFromExternalActivity(
4588                          R.id.search_button, activityName, R.drawable.ic_home_search_normal_holo,
4589                          TOOLBAR_ICON_METADATA_NAME);
4590              }
4591  
4592              if (searchButtonContainer != null) searchButtonContainer.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
4593              searchButton.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
4594              invalidatePressedFocusedStates(searchButtonContainer, searchButton);
4595              return true;
4596          } else {
4597              // We disable both search and voice search when there is no global search provider
4598              if (searchButtonContainer != null) searchButtonContainer.setVisibility(View.GONE);
4599              if (voiceButtonContainer != null) voiceButtonContainer.setVisibility(View.GONE);
4600              if (searchButton != null) searchButton.setVisibility(View.GONE);
4601              if (voiceButton != null) voiceButton.setVisibility(View.GONE);
4602              updateVoiceButtonProxyVisible(false);
4603              return false;
4604          }
4605      }
4606  
4607      protected void updateGlobalSearchIcon(Drawable.ConstantState d) {
4608          final View searchButtonContainer = findViewById(R.id.search_button_container);
4609          final View searchButton = (ImageView) findViewById(R.id.search_button);
4610          updateButtonWithDrawable(R.id.search_button, d);
4611          invalidatePressedFocusedStates(searchButtonContainer, searchButton);
4612      }
4613  
4614      protected boolean updateVoiceSearchIcon(boolean searchVisible) {
4615          final View voiceButtonContainer = findViewById(R.id.voice_button_container);
4616          final View voiceButton = findViewById(R.id.voice_button);
4617  
4618          // We only show/update the voice search icon if the search icon is enabled as well
4619          final SearchManager searchManager =
4620                  (SearchManager) getSystemService(Context.SEARCH_SERVICE);
4621          ComponentName globalSearchActivity = searchManager.getGlobalSearchActivity();
4622  
4623          ComponentName activityName = null;
4624          if (globalSearchActivity != null) {
4625              // Check if the global search activity handles voice search
4626              Intent intent = new Intent(RecognizerIntent.ACTION_WEB_SEARCH);
4627              intent.setPackage(globalSearchActivity.getPackageName());
4628              activityName = intent.resolveActivity(getPackageManager());
4629          }
4630  
4631          if (activityName == null) {
4632              // Fallback: check if an activity other than the global search activity
4633              // resolves this
4634              Intent intent = new Intent(RecognizerIntent.ACTION_WEB_SEARCH);
4635              activityName = intent.resolveActivity(getPackageManager());
4636          }
4637          if (searchVisible && activityName != null) {
4638              int coi = getCurrentOrientationIndexForGlobalIcons();
4639              sVoiceSearchIcon[coi] = updateButtonWithIconFromExternalActivity(
4640                      R.id.voice_button, activityName, R.drawable.ic_home_voice_search_holo,
4641                      TOOLBAR_VOICE_SEARCH_ICON_METADATA_NAME);
4642              if (sVoiceSearchIcon[coi] == null) {
4643                  sVoiceSearchIcon[coi] = updateButtonWithIconFromExternalActivity(
4644                          R.id.voice_button, activityName, R.drawable.ic_home_voice_search_holo,
4645                          TOOLBAR_ICON_METADATA_NAME);
4646              }
4647              if (voiceButtonContainer != null) voiceButtonContainer.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
4648              voiceButton.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
4649              updateVoiceButtonProxyVisible(false);
4650              invalidatePressedFocusedStates(voiceButtonContainer, voiceButton);
4651              return true;
4652          } else {
4653              if (voiceButtonContainer != null) voiceButtonContainer.setVisibility(View.GONE);
4654              if (voiceButton != null) voiceButton.setVisibility(View.GONE);
4655              updateVoiceButtonProxyVisible(false);
4656              return false;
4657          }
4658      }
4659  
4660      protected void updateVoiceSearchIcon(Drawable.ConstantState d) {
4661          final View voiceButtonContainer = findViewById(R.id.voice_button_container);
4662          final View voiceButton = findViewById(R.id.voice_button);
4663          updateButtonWithDrawable(R.id.voice_button, d);
4664          invalidatePressedFocusedStates(voiceButtonContainer, voiceButton);
4665      }
4666  
4667      public void updateVoiceButtonProxyVisible(boolean forceDisableVoiceButtonProxy) {
4668          final View voiceButtonProxy = findViewById(R.id.voice_button_proxy);
4669          if (voiceButtonProxy != null) {
4670              boolean visible = !forceDisableVoiceButtonProxy &&
4671                      mWorkspace.shouldVoiceButtonProxyBeVisible();
4672              voiceButtonProxy.setVisibility(visible ? View.VISIBLE : View.GONE);
4673              voiceButtonProxy.bringToFront();
4674          }
4675      }

4679       * will be hidden regardless of what shouldVoiceButtonProxyBeVisible() returns.
4680       */
4681      public void disableVoiceButtonProxy(boolean disabled) {
4682          updateVoiceButtonProxyVisible(disabled);
4683      }

4723      @Override
4724      public boolean dispatchPopulateAccessibilityEvent(AccessibilityEvent event) {
4725          final boolean result = super.dispatchPopulateAccessibilityEvent(event);
4726          final List<CharSequence> text = event.getText();
4727          text.clear();
4728          // Populate event with a fake title based on the current state.
4729          if (mState == State.APPS_CUSTOMIZE) {
4730 -            text.add(mAppsCustomizeTabHost.getCurrentTabView().getContentDescription());
4731 +            text.add(mAppsCustomizeTabHost.getContentTag());
4732          } else {
4733              text.add(getString(R.string.all_apps_home_button_label));
4734          }
4735          return result;
4736      }

4748      /**
4749       * Receives notifications whenever the appwidgets are reset.
4750       */
4751      private class AppWidgetResetObserver extends ContentObserver {
4752          public AppWidgetResetObserver() {
4753              super(new Handler());
4754          }
4755  
4756          @Override
4757          public void onChange(boolean selfChange) {
4758              onAppWidgetReset();
4759          }

4761  
4762      /**
4763       * If the activity is currently paused, signal that we need to run the passed Runnable
4764       * in onResume.
4765       *
4766       * This needs to be called from incoming places where resources might have been loaded
4767       * while we are paused.  That is becaues the Configuration might be wrong
4768       * when we're not running, and if it comes back to what it was when we
4769       * were paused, we are not restarted.
4770       *
4771       * Implementation of the method from LauncherModel.Callbacks.
4772       *
4773       * @return true if we are currently paused.  The caller might be able to
4774       * skip some work in that case since we will come back again.
4775       */
4776      private boolean waitUntilResume(Runnable run, boolean deletePreviousRunnables) {
4777          if (mPaused) {
4778              Log.i(TAG, "Deferring update until onResume");
4779              if (deletePreviousRunnables) {
4780                  while (mBindOnResumeCallbacks.remove(run)) {
4781                  }
4782              }
4783              mBindOnResumeCallbacks.add(run);
4784              return true;
4785          } else {
4786              return false;
4787          }
4788      }
4789  
4790      private boolean waitUntilResume(Runnable run) {
4791          return waitUntilResume(run, false);
4792      }
4793  
4794      public void addOnResumeCallback(Runnable run) {
4795          mOnResumeCallbacks.add(run);
4796      }
4797  
4798      /**
4799       * If the activity is currently paused, signal that we need to re-run the loader
4800       * in onResume.
4801       *
4802       * This needs to be called from incoming places where resources might have been loaded
4803       * while we are paused.  That is becaues the Configuration might be wrong
4804       * when we're not running, and if it comes back to what it was when we
4805       * were paused, we are not restarted.
4806       *
4807       * Implementation of the method from LauncherModel.Callbacks.
4808       *
4809       * @return true if we are currently paused.  The caller might be able to
4810       * skip some work in that case since we will come back again.
4811       */
4812      public boolean setLoadOnResume() {
4813          if (mPaused) {
4814              Log.i(TAG, "setLoadOnResume");
4815              mOnResumeNeedsLoad = true;
4816              return true;
4817          } else {
4818              return false;
4819          }
4820      }
4821  
4822      /**
4823       * Implementation of the method from LauncherModel.Callbacks.
4824       */
4825      public int getCurrentWorkspaceScreen() {
4826          if (mWorkspace != null) {
4827              return mWorkspace.getCurrentPage();
4828          } else {
4829              return SCREEN_COUNT / 2;
4830          }
4831      }
4832  
4833      /**
4834       * Refreshes the shortcuts shown on the workspace.
4835       *
4836       * Implementation of the method from LauncherModel.Callbacks.
4837       */
4838      public void startBinding() {
4839 +        setWorkspaceLoading(true);
4840 +
4841          // If we're starting binding all over again, clear any bind calls we'd postponed in
4842          // the past (see waitUntilResume) -- we don't need them since we're starting binding
4843          // from scratch again
4844          mBindOnResumeCallbacks.clear();
4845  
4846          // Clear the workspace because it's going to be rebound
4847          mWorkspace.clearDropTargets();
4848          mWorkspace.removeAllWorkspaceScreens();
4849  
4850          mWidgetsToAdvance.clear();
4851          if (mHotseat != null) {
4852              mHotseat.resetLayout();
4853          }
4854      }
4855  
4856      @Override
4857      public void bindScreens(ArrayList<Long> orderedScreenIds) {
4858          bindAddScreens(orderedScreenIds);
4859  
4860          // If there are no screens, we need to have an empty screen
4861          if (orderedScreenIds.size() == 0) {
4862              mWorkspace.addExtraEmptyScreen();
4863          }
4864  
4865          // Create the custom content page (this call updates mDefaultScreen which calls
4866          // setCurrentPage() so ensure that all pages are added before calling this).
4867 -        // The actual content of the custom page will be added during onFinishBindingItems().
4868 -        if (!mWorkspace.hasCustomContent() && hasCustomContentToLeft()) {
4869 -            mWorkspace.createCustomContentPage();
4870 +        if (hasCustomContentToLeft()) {
4871 +            mWorkspace.createCustomContentContainer();
4872 +            populateCustomContentContainer();
4873          }
4874      }
4875  
4876      @Override
4877      public void bindAddScreens(ArrayList<Long> orderedScreenIds) {
4878          // Log to disk
4879          Launcher.addDumpLog(TAG, "11683562 - bindAddScreens()", true);
4880          Launcher.addDumpLog(TAG, "11683562 -   orderedScreenIds: " +
4881                  TextUtils.join(", ", orderedScreenIds), true);
4882          int count = orderedScreenIds.size();
4883          for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
4884              mWorkspace.insertNewWorkspaceScreenBeforeEmptyScreen(orderedScreenIds.get(i));
4885          }
4886      }
4887  
4888      private boolean shouldShowWeightWatcher() {
4889          String spKey = LauncherAppState.getSharedPreferencesKey();
4890          SharedPreferences sp = getSharedPreferences(spKey, Context.MODE_PRIVATE);
4891          boolean show = sp.getBoolean(SHOW_WEIGHT_WATCHER, SHOW_WEIGHT_WATCHER_DEFAULT);
4892  
4893          return show;
4894      }
4895  
4896      private void toggleShowWeightWatcher() {
4897          String spKey = LauncherAppState.getSharedPreferencesKey();
4898          SharedPreferences sp = getSharedPreferences(spKey, Context.MODE_PRIVATE);
4899          boolean show = sp.getBoolean(SHOW_WEIGHT_WATCHER, true);
4900  
4901          show = !show;
4902  
4903          SharedPreferences.Editor editor = sp.edit();
4904          editor.putBoolean(SHOW_WEIGHT_WATCHER, show);
4905          editor.commit();
4906  
4907          if (mWeightWatcher != null) {
4908              mWeightWatcher.setVisibility(show ? View.VISIBLE : View.GONE);
4909          }
4910      }
4911  
4912      public void bindAppsAdded(final ArrayList<Long> newScreens,
4913                                final ArrayList<ItemInfo> addNotAnimated,
4914                                final ArrayList<ItemInfo> addAnimated,
4915                                final ArrayList<AppInfo> addedApps) {
4916          Runnable r = new Runnable() {
4917              public void run() {
4918                  bindAppsAdded(newScreens, addNotAnimated, addAnimated, addedApps);
4919              }
4920          };
4921          if (waitUntilResume(r)) {
4922              return;
4923          }
4924  
4925          // Add the new screens
4926 -        bindAddScreens(newScreens);
4927 +        if (newScreens != null) {
4928 +            bindAddScreens(newScreens);
4929 +        }
4930  
4931          // We add the items without animation on non-visible pages, and with
4932          // animations on the new page (which we will try and snap to).
4933 -        if (!addNotAnimated.isEmpty()) {
4934 +        if (addNotAnimated != null && !addNotAnimated.isEmpty()) {
4935              bindItems(addNotAnimated, 0,
4936                      addNotAnimated.size(), false);
4937          }
4938 -        if (!addAnimated.isEmpty()) {
4939 +        if (addAnimated != null && !addAnimated.isEmpty()) {
4940              bindItems(addAnimated, 0,
4941                      addAnimated.size(), true);
4942          }
4943  
4944          // Remove the extra empty screen
4945 -        mWorkspace.removeExtraEmptyScreen(false, null);
4946 -
4947 -        if (!AppsCustomizePagedView.DISABLE_ALL_APPS &&
4948 +        mWorkspace.removeExtraEmptyScreen(false, false);
4949 +
4950 +        if (!LauncherAppState.isDisableAllApps() &&
4951                  addedApps != null && mAppsCustomizeContent != null) {
4952              mAppsCustomizeContent.addApps(addedApps);
4953          }
4954      }
4955  
4956      /**
4957       * Bind the items start-end from the list.
4958       *
4959       * Implementation of the method from LauncherModel.Callbacks.
4960       */
4961      public void bindItems(final ArrayList<ItemInfo> shortcuts, final int start, final int end,
4962                            final boolean forceAnimateIcons) {
4963          Runnable r = new Runnable() {
4964              public void run() {
4965                  bindItems(shortcuts, start, end, forceAnimateIcons);
4966              }
4967          };
4968          if (waitUntilResume(r)) {
4969              return;
4970          }
4971  
4972          // Get the list of added shortcuts and intersect them with the set of shortcuts here
4973          final AnimatorSet anim = LauncherAnimUtils.createAnimatorSet();
4974          final Collection<Animator> bounceAnims = new ArrayList<Animator>();
4975          final boolean animateIcons = forceAnimateIcons && canRunNewAppsAnimation();
4976          Workspace workspace = mWorkspace;
4977          long newShortcutsScreenId = -1;
4978          for (int i = start; i < end; i++) {
4979              final ItemInfo item = shortcuts.get(i);
4980  
4981              // Short circuit if we are loading dock items for a configuration which has no dock
4982              if (item.container == LauncherSettings.Favorites.CONTAINER_HOTSEAT &&
4983                      mHotseat == null) {
4984                  continue;
4985              }
4986  
4987              switch (item.itemType) {
4988                  case LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_APPLICATION:
4989                  case LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_SHORTCUT:
4990                      ShortcutInfo info = (ShortcutInfo) item;
4991                      View shortcut = createShortcut(info);
4992  
4993                      /*
4994                       * TODO: FIX collision case
4995                       */
4996                      if (item.container == LauncherSettings.Favorites.CONTAINER_DESKTOP) {
4997                          CellLayout cl = mWorkspace.getScreenWithId(item.screenId);
4998                          if (cl != null && cl.isOccupied(item.cellX, item.cellY)) {
4999 -                            throw new RuntimeException("OCCUPIED");
5000 +                            View v = cl.getChildAt(item.cellX, item.cellY);
5001 +                            Object tag = v.getTag();
5002 +                            String desc = "Collision while binding workspace item: " + item
5003 +                                    + ". Collides with " + tag;
5004 +                            if (LauncherAppState.isDogfoodBuild()) {
5005 +                                throw (new RuntimeException(desc));
5006 +                            } else {
5007 +                                Log.d(TAG, desc);
5008 +                            }
5009                          }
5010                      }
5011  
5012                      workspace.addInScreenFromBind(shortcut, item.container, item.screenId, item.cellX,
5013                              item.cellY, 1, 1);
5014                      if (animateIcons) {
5015                          // Animate all the applications up now
5016                          shortcut.setAlpha(0f);
5017                          shortcut.setScaleX(0f);
5018                          shortcut.setScaleY(0f);
5019                          bounceAnims.add(createNewAppBounceAnimation(shortcut, i));
5020                          newShortcutsScreenId = item.screenId;
5021                      }
5022                      break;
5023                  case LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_FOLDER:
5024                      FolderIcon newFolder = FolderIcon.fromXml(R.layout.folder_icon, this,
5025                              (ViewGroup) workspace.getChildAt(workspace.getCurrentPage()),
5026                              (FolderInfo) item, mIconCache);
5027                      workspace.addInScreenFromBind(newFolder, item.container, item.screenId, item.cellX,
5028                              item.cellY, 1, 1);
5029                      break;
5030                  default:
5031                      throw new RuntimeException("Invalid Item Type");
5032              }
5033          }
5034  
5035          if (animateIcons) {
5036              // Animate to the correct page
5037              if (newShortcutsScreenId > -1) {
5038                  long currentScreenId = mWorkspace.getScreenIdForPageIndex(mWorkspace.getNextPage());
5039                  final int newScreenIndex = mWorkspace.getPageIndexForScreenId(newShortcutsScreenId);
5040                  final Runnable startBounceAnimRunnable = new Runnable() {
5041                      public void run() {
5042                          anim.playTogether(bounceAnims);
5043                          anim.start();
5044                      }
5045                  };
5046                  if (newShortcutsScreenId != currentScreenId) {
5047                      // We post the animation slightly delayed to prevent slowdowns
5048                      // when we are loading right after we return to launcher.
5049                      mWorkspace.postDelayed(new Runnable() {
5050                          public void run() {
5051 -                            mWorkspace.snapToPage(newScreenIndex);
5052 -                            mWorkspace.postDelayed(startBounceAnimRunnable,
5053 -                                    NEW_APPS_ANIMATION_DELAY);
5054 +                            if (mWorkspace != null) {
5055 +                                mWorkspace.snapToPage(newScreenIndex);
5056 +                                mWorkspace.postDelayed(startBounceAnimRunnable,
5057 +                                        NEW_APPS_ANIMATION_DELAY);
5058 +                            }
5059                          }
5060                      }, NEW_APPS_PAGE_MOVE_DELAY);
5061                  } else {
5062                      mWorkspace.postDelayed(startBounceAnimRunnable, NEW_APPS_ANIMATION_DELAY);
5063                  }
5064              }
5065          }
5066          workspace.requestLayout();
5067      }
5068  
5069      /**
5070       * Implementation of the method from LauncherModel.Callbacks.
5071       */
5072      public void bindFolders(final HashMap<Long, FolderInfo> folders) {
5073          Runnable r = new Runnable() {
5074              public void run() {
5075                  bindFolders(folders);
5076              }
5077          };
5078          if (waitUntilResume(r)) {
5079              return;
5080          }
5081          sFolders.clear();
5082          sFolders.putAll(folders);
5083      }

5085      /**
5086       * Add the views for a widget to the workspace.
5087       *
5088       * Implementation of the method from LauncherModel.Callbacks.
5089       */
5090      public void bindAppWidget(final LauncherAppWidgetInfo item) {
5091          Runnable r = new Runnable() {
5092              public void run() {
5093                  bindAppWidget(item);
5094              }
5095          };
5096          if (waitUntilResume(r)) {
5097              return;
5098          }
5099  
5100          final long start = DEBUG_WIDGETS ? SystemClock.uptimeMillis() : 0;
5101          if (DEBUG_WIDGETS) {
5102              Log.d(TAG, "bindAppWidget: " + item);
5103          }
5104          final Workspace workspace = mWorkspace;
5105  
5106 -        final int appWidgetId = item.appWidgetId;
5107 -        final AppWidgetProviderInfo appWidgetInfo = mAppWidgetManager.getAppWidgetInfo(appWidgetId);
5108 -        if (DEBUG_WIDGETS) {
5109 -            Log.d(TAG, "bindAppWidget: id=" + item.appWidgetId + " belongs to component " + appWidgetInfo.providerðŸ”µ
5110 -        }
5111 -
5112 -        item.hostView = mAppWidgetHost.createView(this, appWidgetId, appWidgetInfo);
5113 +        AppWidgetProviderInfo appWidgetInfo;
5114 +        if (((item.restoreStatus & LauncherAppWidgetInfo.FLAG_PROVIDER_NOT_READY) == 0) &&
5115 +                ((item.restoreStatus & LauncherAppWidgetInfo.FLAG_ID_NOT_VALID) != 0)) {
5116 +
5117 +            appWidgetInfo = mModel.findAppWidgetProviderInfoWithComponent(this, item.providerName);
5118 +            if (appWidgetInfo == null) {
5119 +                if (DEBUG_WIDGETS) {
5120 +                    Log.d(TAG, "Removing restored widget: id=" + item.appWidgetId
5121 +                            + " belongs to component " + item.providerName
5122 +                            + ", as the povider is null");
5123 +                }
5124 +                LauncherModel.deleteItemFromDatabase(this, item);
5125 +                return;
5126 +            }
5127 +            // Note: This assumes that the id remap broadcast is received before this step.
5128 +            // If that is not the case, the id remap will be ignored and user may see the
5129 +            // click to setup view.
5130 +            PendingAddWidgetInfo pendingInfo = new PendingAddWidgetInfo(appWidgetInfo, null, null);
5131 +            pendingInfo.spanX = item.spanX;
5132 +            pendingInfo.spanY = item.spanY;
5133 +            pendingInfo.minSpanX = item.minSpanX;
5134 +            pendingInfo.minSpanY = item.minSpanY;
5135 +            Bundle options =
5136 +                    AppsCustomizePagedView.getDefaultOptionsForWidget(this, pendingInfo);
5137 +
5138 +            int newWidgetId = mAppWidgetHost.allocateAppWidgetId();
5139 +            boolean success = mAppWidgetManager.bindAppWidgetIdIfAllowed(
5140 +                    newWidgetId, appWidgetInfo, options);
5141 +
5142 +            // TODO consider showing a permission dialog when the widget is clicked.
5143 +            if (!success) {
5144 +                mAppWidgetHost.deleteAppWidgetId(newWidgetId);
5145 +                if (DEBUG_WIDGETS) {
5146 +                    Log.d(TAG, "Removing restored widget: id=" + item.appWidgetId
5147 +                            + " belongs to component " + item.providerName
5148 +                            + ", as the launcher is unable to bing a new widget id");
5149 +                }
5150 +                LauncherModel.deleteItemFromDatabase(this, item);
5151 +                return;
5152 +            }
5153 +
5154 +            item.appWidgetId = newWidgetId;
5155 +
5156 +            // If the widget has a configure activity, it is still needs to set it up, otherwise
5157 +            // the widget is ready to go.
5158 +            item.restoreStatus = (appWidgetInfo.configure == null)
5159 +                    ? LauncherAppWidgetInfo.RESTORE_COMPLETED
5160 +                    : LauncherAppWidgetInfo.FLAG_UI_NOT_READY;
5161 +
5162 +            LauncherModel.updateItemInDatabase(this, item);
5163 +        }
5164 +
5165 +        if (item.restoreStatus == LauncherAppWidgetInfo.RESTORE_COMPLETED) {
5166 +            final int appWidgetId = item.appWidgetId;
5167 +            appWidgetInfo = mAppWidgetManager.getAppWidgetInfo(appWidgetId);
5168 +            if (DEBUG_WIDGETS) {
5169 +                Log.d(TAG, "bindAppWidget: id=" + item.appWidgetId + " belongs to component " + appWidgetInfo.provðŸ”µ
5170 +            }
5171 +
5172 +            item.hostView = mAppWidgetHost.createView(this, appWidgetId, appWidgetInfo);
5173 +        } else {
5174 +            appWidgetInfo = null;
5175 +            PendingAppWidgetHostView view = new PendingAppWidgetHostView(this, item);
5176 +            view.updateIcon(mIconCache);
5177 +            item.hostView = view;
5178 +            item.hostView.updateAppWidget(null);
5179 +            item.hostView.setOnClickListener(this);
5180 +        }
5181  
5182          item.hostView.setTag(item);
5183          item.onBindAppWidget(this);
5184  
5185          workspace.addInScreen(item.hostView, item.container, item.screenId, item.cellX,
5186                  item.cellY, item.spanX, item.spanY, false);
5187          addWidgetToAutoAdvanceIfNeeded(item.hostView, appWidgetInfo);
5188  
5189          workspace.requestLayout();
5190  
5191          if (DEBUG_WIDGETS) {
5192              Log.d(TAG, "bound widget id="+item.appWidgetId+" in "
5193                      + (SystemClock.uptimeMillis()-start) + "ms");
5194          }
5195 +    }
5196 +
5197 +    /**
5198 +     * Restores a pending widget.
5199 +     *
5200 +     * @param appWidgetId The app widget id
5201 +     * @param cellInfo The position on screen where to create the widget.
5202 +     */
5203 +    private void completeRestoreAppWidget(final int appWidgetId) {
5204 +        LauncherAppWidgetHostView view = mWorkspace.getWidgetForAppWidgetId(appWidgetId);
5205 +        if ((view == null) || !(view instanceof PendingAppWidgetHostView)) {
5206 +            Log.e(TAG, "Widget update called, when the widget no longer exists.");
5207 +            return;
5208 +        }
5209 +
5210 +        LauncherAppWidgetInfo info = (LauncherAppWidgetInfo) view.getTag();
5211 +        info.restoreStatus = LauncherAppWidgetInfo.RESTORE_COMPLETED;
5212 +
5213 +        mWorkspace.reinflateWidgetsIfNecessary();
5214 +        LauncherModel.updateItemInDatabase(this, info);
5215      }

5265 +            // the screen would be guaranteed to exist after bind, and the page would be set through

5290 +
5291 +    private void sendLoadingCompleteBroadcastIfNecessary() {
5292 +        if (!mSharedPrefs.getBoolean(FIRST_LOAD_COMPLETE, false)) {
5293 +            String permission =
5294 +                    getResources().getString(R.string.receive_first_load_broadcast_permission);
5295 +            Intent intent = new Intent(ACTION_FIRST_LOAD_COMPLETE);
5296 +            sendBroadcast(intent, permission);
5297 +            SharedPreferences.Editor editor = mSharedPrefs.edit();
5298 +            editor.putBoolean(FIRST_LOAD_COMPLETE, true);
5299 +            editor.apply();
5300 +        }
5301      }
